page.title: 09MARCONI RESEARCH LAB.C'FORD
page.content: All together the G.E.C Research Centre takes up 45 acres of land and 1,071 people work there.The buildings have been there since 1939.The 365 foot mast on the site was used during the war for communications and to track down the German Luftwaffe,but today it is more of a hazard to aircraft as there are no warning lights. The Centre makes software and electronic equipment.It makes parts for ships, satellites and antennae.The parts are bought by many different countries. There is also a department for robots and factory automation.They make lasers.If you put your hand in front of a laser,it would cut it off.When they make a microchip,they have to make it in a very clean room.If one bit of dust gets into the works,it would not function.
